The FMI strategy is derived from an aggregation of academic finance material regarding market behaviors and knowledge agreed upon by greatest investors of all time. We apply time-tested principals to realtime stock fundamentals and news information Our goal is to identify cheap stocks before or during a growth catalyst. Our Mission

The birth of low cost finance softwares has fostered a new way to manage your money. Over are the times of self-interested brokers, high trading fees, limited access to real-time stock information, and high barriers of entry into investing. Our mission is to offer education, research, and techniques for everyone to use to earn the same returns offered by a financial advisor for a fraction of the cost. With the internet, investing is easy, yet people every year further themselves from retirement either by paying heft fees for a financial advisor, or not investing at all. Our goal is to take the fear out of personal investing and to empower everyone to own his or her financial future.

Our Strategy

At FMI, we emplore low cost technologies combined with academically researched stock filtering strategies to enable people like you to earn the same returns you can get through a financial advisor for a fraction of the cost. We believe there are X easy steps to securing your financial future today.


Step 1

Open a low cost investment account such as Robinhood or Acorns


Step 2

Determine your monthly contribution


Step 3

Determine your investment experience and choose your investment vehicles


Step 4

Dont Quit and Don't Exit!


If you are new to investing and want to learn more, take a look at the detailed breakdown of each step
